title.narrative: PDE – 2019 - research management and governance - Phase II Capacity Building to STI directors and managers in regions

description.narrative: It aims to strengthen the skills of STI managers in regions directly involved in STI operations to enable them to direct and move forward the territorial industrial agenda. Participating regions will be the same ones that took part in the 2019 February workshop on governance: Piura, Cajamarca, Moquegua, Cuzco, La Libertad, San Martin, Tacna.

Professional development programme for stakeholders on STI management in Regions (inside Peru , tentatively: Trujillo, Cajamarca, Piura, San Martin, Tacna, Cusco, Moquegua) . To train and increase capacity in the Regional Governements, the Academia, companies/chambers of commerce, of professionals capable to design and execute effective strategies for improving the economy and well-being of their territory through science and technology. Aligned with National Policy of Competitiveness and Productivity SDGs: 8,9,10
